$^ Notes:: Strings starting with '$^' will be treated as comments.
Tests matching at least one of the criteria in one of the categories below will be excluded from the filtered testlist.
For each category, a list of regex patterns can be supplied as exclude criteria.
exe-name: $^ Exclude all but a few tests for testing purposes
list-entry: $^ Match the entire line in the testlist against these patterns:
source-name: $^ Match the name of each source file of the test against these patterns:
source-contents: $^ Match each line of each source file of the test against these patterns
